text: Peter Robin Brunyee (1939-2014), was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England in the 120 yards hurdles at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. He was the first Worksop Harrier athlete to represent England. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:English male sprinters Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Robin Brunyee
